item.description:
Enabling Device Innovation: Advances in Engineering Design Tools

 

The presentation consists of a case study about improving medical device development (reducing development time or improving device performance) using multi-disciplinary engineering simulaton tools.  For example, the tools may simulate medical devices with various combinations of dissimilar components such as electronics, control hardware and software, signal processing software, mechanical dynamics, fluidics or pneumatics.    


Speaker:
Dave Hoadley, Principal Pilot Engineer, MathWorks

Date: March 16, 2011
Time: 5:30 - 8:30PM
Location: Rebecca's Cafe,
275 Grove Street, Auburndale, MA
Info:  judy@vitalnow.net

http://web.memberclicks.com/mc/community/eventdetails.do?eventId=288195&orgId=meg&recurringId=0
item.name: Enabling Device Innovation: Advances in Engineering Design Tools
